runs.comm: short of length ball on leg stump, defended towards square leg for a single
huge appeal for lbw, but that was sliding down the leg side, this one goes on with the angle, doesn't spin away from Dhawan
pushed towards mid-off this time
blocked towards point by Dhawan
Dhawan skips down the track and pushes the ball towards mid-on
blocked back towards the bowler
starts with a full ball that is punched towards mid-off
length ball on off stump, Rohit gets across and taps it to midwicket
short of length ball outside off, guides it past the two slips towards third man
length ball on off stump, 143kph from Junaid, defended towards mid-off

gets down the track and pushes this towards mid-on, there's a direct hit and the crowd roars, but Dhawan seems to have made his ground, yes, he has, helped that he was a couple of paces down the track when he played the shot
beauty  from Junaid, curving away with the angle, Rohit fishes at it and luckily for him, he doesn't nibble it through to the keeper, good over this from Junaid
plenty of bounce there, Hafeez drags it shorter as he spots Dhawan advancing, hits high on the bat as Dhawan awkwardly jabs at it
on the pads, eased towards square leg
length ball that goes straight on, Rohit looks to drive through cover, beaten by the bounce
on the pads, defended towards midwicket for a quick single
length ball heading for the leg stump, defended off the front foot

paddles it away for four, risky shot but he knew fine leg was in the circle, Rohit gets his front foot well outside off and doesn't look to power the ball, good that he connected well with it, else there would have been plenty of carping
whoah! this time Rohit gets six, he skips down the track  and carves this one over point, moving away from the stumps to get the room to swing freely
down towards third man for a single, a controlled glide from Rohit
Dhawan wafts at that one, and is beaten, the bounce again, beats the cross-bat shot, it was a back of length ball outside off, good one from Junaid
short of length ball is dabbed towards point, Dhawan is now 4 off 12, will he attempt something risky now?
terrific ball to end the over,  again bounces more than Dhawan expected, somehow he manages to get bat on it and sends it wide of slip, Dhawan in all sorts of trouble in this over
Dhawan goes for a cross-batted heave, he is beaten as the ball spins away after pitching around off
Dhawan somehow not getting out here, this one skids on and bounces just over the top of off, Dhawan looking to chop that towards point
slugs this towards deep square leg, gets a boundary, this will be a big relief for Dhawan, who has had a few close calls in the last few minutes
dropped short, Dhawan gets on the back foot,and flat-bats that powerfully past the bowler for four
slices this towards backward point
length ball is swept well behind square leg this time, three boundaries in the over for Dhawan, he hasn't looked at his most comfortable, but he's now on 17 off 19 and India have moved on to 31 for 0
an lbw appeal, think there was an inside edge there, otherwise that was going on to hit middle, now there's a run-out appeal as the ball is thrown in from point, Dhawan has just about made it
Dhawan somehow survives again, looking to whip the ball to the leg side, got an inside-edge onto the pad
another slog from Dhawan, makes no contact this time, it was a slower one from Gul, through to the keeper
that waas an eye-cathing stroke from Dhawan, both feet off the ground as he upper cuts a short ball that was over head high, loops towards third man for a couple

Dhawan dances down the ground, and gets a thick outside edge, that lands short of a diving Maqsood at first slip[, and what's worse, it strikes him midships, Maqsood in some pain here, wishing he had worn an abdominal guard
that was poor from Gul, down the leg side, Dhawan just has to steer it past short fine leg, he thumps it past short fine leg for four
length ball on off stump, defended off the front foot to the off side
drags it short and that is powered towards sweeper cover
on middle stump, Dhawan gets behind the line and pushes the ball towards point
aaja Umar, Kamran shouts as Rohit taps the ball towards backward point, Umar Akmal stops the single
driven towards cover for another dot ball
this time Umar Akmal can't stop the single, played with soft hands by Rohit, giving time to take the run
defended towards cover off the front foot
short of a length ball is dismissed from his presence, Rohit Sharma launches this over long-on for six, Rohit rarely goes for the slog when he's aiming to clear the rope
short of length ball, plenty of bounce once more, guided behind point for a couple, the fifty stand comes up
length ball on the pads, that is thumped past the bowler for four, it wasn't too far from Gul but that was powerfully struck, another boundary for Dhawan

Dhawan perishes to the short ball again, though this time it is because he was going for another adventurous strokes, looking to hook when he is nowhere in position, top edge as it hits low on the blade, down to fine leg where Ajmal holds on, that innings wasn't quite easy on the eye, a flurry of slogs and close calls
down the leg side
Kohli defends this one off the back foot
defended off the front foot, edged onto the pad
blocks another one, three dots to start for Kohli
driven towards cover, and Kohli is still not off the mark
down the leg side for another wide, Kohli charges back for the second, so four dot balls but he has still conceded four runs
lovely from Kohli, waits on the back foot, and gently guides the legspinner past slip for four, great way to get off the mark
defended towards point for a single, nine off the over though the first four balls were dot balls
whipped towards square leg

turn here for Ajmal, much more than Rohit expected, he was looking to cut the ball as it pitched well outside off, but it spins in a long way, and Rohit gets a bottom edge onto the stumps, Rohit swings his bat in frustration after the dismissal
a doosra, heading for the pads, Yuvraj tucks it to square leg for a single
length ball on the pads, clipped towards midwicket, this was another doosra

huge appeal for a caught-behind, Kamran Akmal is convinced but the umpire isn't, this one spins down the leg side after pitching just outside off, umpire doesn't signal wide as well, so he rules that it is off the pad

what a start from Bhatti, a quick full ball and Yuvraj's stumps are in disarray, 137kph, Yuvraj is stuck in the crease and looks to play across the line, offstump is reclining, Pakistan clawing their way back here
length ball is eased towards wide mid-on for a single
short of length ball, guided towards square leg
superb hit from Raina, short of length ball outside off, Raina guides that past a diving point for four, top timing on that stroke
short of length ball, 133kph, Raina pulls that gently behind square
full ball is crisply driven to mid-on
skids on towards middle, defended off the back foot to the off side
short of length ball spinning towards the pads, bounce there, Kohli defends to the leg side
off the pad and that loops high and lands on the pitch
Hafeez drops it short and that is hammered over midwicket for six, takes on the man in the deep and clears him
full ball is pushed towards long-on for a single
dropped, a tough chance at first slip, a thin outside edge from Raina, Afridi had to dove to his right to snaffle that low chance, he can't, Raina survives
pitched up and that is driven towards mid-off
slammed that to the midwicket boundary, this was a short ball that sat up, easy put away as his attempted slower offcutter goes wrong
short ball, Raina keeps it down as he gently pulls it in front of square
short of length ball just outside off, steered down to third man for a single
Bhatti bowls short again, Raina backs away from the stumps and thumps this to the midwicket boundary for four more, Bhatti needs to be fuller
spins in towards off, clipped towards square leg for a single
drops this just behind point, straight to Tanvir but they still pinch a single
on the pads, stayed a touch low, taps this behind square leg for a single
length ball just outside off, punched towards point
the doosra, defended from the crease back towards the bowler
more careful defence, India deciding to not take risks against Ajmal at this stage
Kohli steps down the track and plays a lofted drive past long-off, Kohli guiding India's chase yet again
outside off and that is guided towards deep backward point for two more
careful defence off the front foot
Kohli wants to finish this off early, he dances down the track and absolutely lashes this past the bowler for four
clipped behind square leg for one more
length ball on middle, played from within the crease, turned towards square leg for one more
Gul returns, leading edge from Raina, the ball flies over cover for a single
Kohli comes down the track and then guides the ball towards deep backward point
back of a length ball, Kohli opens the face to run the ball towards third man
short of length and well outside off, slower one is guided towards deep backward point
a low full toss just outside off, whipped in front of square leg
short ball and that is way over Raina's head
driven towards extra cover for a quick single
defended towards short cover
tucked towards square leg
goes deep in the crease and pushes this towards long-on for a single, the 50 stand comes up
full ball that Kohli wanted to carve through cover with a flat bat, too full for that sort of shot, he misses
blocked off the front foot towards cover
Ajmal's quota is over, clipped towards square leg, good effort from Ajmal, 1-18 even though he was slogged for three fours in his first over
a swipe from Raina, he was looking to go leg side but it soars over mid-off for four, Raina won't complain
short of length ball, played off the thigh pad towards midwicket, yes-no between the batsmen before they decide to not go for the run
a bouncer that Raina wants to help towards fine leg, doesn't connect
drops this towards point for a quick single
defended towards point off the front foot
length ball is flicked to the midwicket boundary, doesn't bother keeping it down, picking the gap perfectly
dropped, Raina gets a let off at midwicket, a short of length ball is thumped to midwicket, Hafeez should have taken this though it was a little away from him to his left
scores are level as Raina deposits this over the midwicket boundary
down the leg side, Raina has the simple job of helping that off his thigh pad towards fine leg, and that's a straightforward win for India
